mcom.umeer.insert: INSERT INTO EM_ROLE ( ROLE_ID, ROLE_NAME, ROLE_DESC, CREATE_AUTHOR, CREATE_DATETIME, UPDATE_AUTHOR, UPDATE_DATETIME ) VALUES ( #{roleId}, #{roleName}, #{roleDesc}, #{createAuthor}, current_timestamp(), #{updateAuthor}, current_timestamp() )
mcom.umeer.update: UPDATE EM_ROLE SET ROLE_NAME = #{roleName}, ROLE_DESC = #{roleDesc}, CREATE_AUTHOR = #{createAuthor}, CREATE_DATETIME = #{createDatetime}, UPDATE_AUTHOR = #{updateAuthor}, UPDATE_DATETIME = current_timestamp() WHERE UPDATE_DATETIME = #{updateDatetime} AND ROLE_ID = #{roleId} AND UPDATE_DATETIME = #{updateDatetime}
mcom.umeer.select: SELECT ROLE_ID AS "roleId", ROLE_NAME AS "roleName", ROLE_DESC AS "roleDesc", CREATE_AUTHOR AS "createAuthor", CREATE_DATETIME AS "createDatetime", UPDATE_AUTHOR AS "updateAuthor", UPDATE_DATETIME AS "updateDatetime" FROM EM_ROLE WHERE ROLE_ID = #{roleId}
